name: game-leaderboard
description: A high-performance game leaderboard with redis + redis-server standalone + http api server used with nginx proxy + slack notifications
author: a3diti

scripts.start: nohup node index.js >> running.log 2>&1 & echo $! > running.pid
scripts.restart: redis-cli -p 31001 save ; pkill -F running.pid >/dev/null 2>&1 && nohup node index.js >> running.log 2>&1 & echo $! > running.pid
